name: modder
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who makes changes to computer or games software or hardware (= equipment), or to vehicles, in order to create their own version, as a hobby: The gaming convention attracts a large population of modders, people who build or tweak hardware and software. One modder built a DIY Segway.
More examplesFewer examplesThere is an evolving community of modders challenging each other to build the most popular new game levels. Nintendo doesn't sell a portable Wii, but one intrepid modder took the initiative and built a Wii "laptop".I lose patience with the whole thing - I'm not cut out to be a hacker or a modder.You may not know it, but there's a healthy modder community for Macs.
